system.novice: Navigator Learns target's Armour Points at each location, total Toughness Bonus, and Psy Rating (if they have one)
system.adept: Navigator also learns of any Invisible Defences such as Force Fields, and Sustained Psychic Techniques.
system.master: Navigator also learns any Psychic Techniques or Navigator powers the target knows.
